## Morphological Target
- **Organ/Structure**: [e.g., eye, limb, tail]
- **Species**: [e.g., Xenopus laevis, Planaria]
- **Action**: [e.g., induce, regenerate, remodel]

## Bioelectric State
- **Target Vmem Range**: [e.g., -50 to -30 mV]
- **Spatial Domain**: [e.g., ventral ectoderm, amputation plane]
- **Duration**: [e.g., 24 hours]

## Hardware Drivers
List the molecular tools that can induce this state:
- **Type**: [e.g., ion channel mRNA, drug cocktail]
- **Name**: [e.g., Kv1.5, Monensin]
- **Mechanism**: [e.g., K+ efflux, gap junction blockade]

## Primary Reference
- **Citation**: [Author et al., Year, Journal]
- **DOI/Link**: [URL to paper]

- [ ] Published in peer-reviewed journal
- [ ] Reproducible methodology described
- [ ] Vmem measurements provided
